sentences.english: When you are old and grey and full of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 当你老了，白发苍苍，睡意朦胧。

sentences.english: Red Dust deep gray fog Oi.
Ups and downs, there are lush snow mountains and spruces .
sentences.chinese: 山峦起伏跌宕，生长着茂密的雪岭云杉，苍苍莽莽。

sentences.english: If snow be white, why then her breasts are dun;
sentences.chinese: 雪若算白，她的胸膛便算褐色苍苍。

sentences.english: Years later, I totter by the River in white hair.
sentences.chinese: 许多年之后，我白发苍苍的蹒跚走在河边。

sentences.english: He was a grey-haired old man.
sentences.chinese: 他已是一位白发苍苍的老头。

sentences.english: He is a grey-haired thin old man.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位白发苍苍的瘦老头。

sentences.english: “You have big hands, ” the white-haired doctor said as he shook the patient’s hand.
sentences.chinese: “你的手较大，”白发苍苍的医生和病人握手时说道。

sentences.english: Gray hairs in their respective go see a water out and who embrace leave.
sentences.chinese: 白发苍苍各自去看场细水长流与着谁拥抱离去。

sentences.english: The spring water is clear while its color is dark as China ink, hence its name.
sentences.chinese: 墨泉水清透明，水色苍苍如墨因而得名。

sentences.english: Spend the two people from the white-haired, how long.
sentences.chinese: 两个人从相守到白发苍苍，需要多久。

sentences.english: I do not want to remarry him.
sentences.chinese: 我可不希望到了白发苍苍和他复婚。

sentences.english: White-haired folks reading the paper on their farmhouse porches at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下时，白发苍苍的老人们坐在家舍门廊上看报。

sentences.english: The vast heaven and earth color, gray.
Just then a white-haired woman entered supported by the team leader.
sentences.chinese: 就在这时，一位白发苍苍的妇女由队长扶着走了进来。

sentences.english: Do not always say that their old, out of mind the old, white-haired then why not?
sentences.chinese: 不要总说自己老了，心不老，白发苍苍又何妨？

definition: deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
greenish yellow/sallow (pale or yellow complexion)/variant of 倉皇|仓皇[cang1 huang2]
Qingshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei/Qingshan district of Baotou city 包頭市|包头市[Bao1 tou2 shi4], Inner Mongolia
white head of hair/fig. old person
